name: whole genome sequencing assay
description: A DNA sequencing assay that intends to provide information about the sequence of an entire genome of an organism.

name: RNA-seq assay
description: An transcription profiling assay that determines an RNA sequence by analyzing the transcibed regions of the genome and or to quantitate transcript abundance.

name: exome sequencing assay
description: A DNA sequencing assay that intends to provide information about the sequence of the protein coding components of a genome (exons).
